version_description:
Good news, thanks to all your feedback about our last update we've fixed a bug that caused some people to experience loading problems when opening the app.

Even more good news: we just added listen again!

That means you can stream shows from the last seven days straight from the app on iPhone and iPad. AMAZING.

Did you know? If you want to listen to a different Capital FM region, you can change it by going to Tools & Settings in the app menu, then select change location.

We always listen to your feedback, so please get in touch and let us know what you think about our latest update at app-feedback@thisisglobal.com.

Thanks to your feedback we've fixed a bug that may still have caused some users to experience loading problems when opening the app.

We always listen to your feedback, so please get in touch and let us know what you think about our latest update at app-feedback@thisisglobal.com.

Bug fixes and performance improvements.

We always listen to your feedback, so please get in touch and let us know what you think about our latest update at app-feedback@thisisglobal.com.

Thanks to everyone who got in touch about our Listen Again update - good news, we've added the ability to fast forward and rewind our on demand content!

Just tap on the playbar when you're catching up with your favourite DJ or shows to access the Listen Again scrubber. It’s that simple.

We always listen to your feedback, so please get in touch and let us know what you think about our latest update at app-feedback@thisisglobal.com.

- New and improved lock screen. 
- New Listen again 20 second skipping.
- Bug fixes and improvements.

We’re really excited to bring you our biggest update yet: Welcome to My Capital!

Now you can SKIP tracks on live radio, so if you want to go straight to the next song… now you can! Simply swipe left when listening to live radio and enter My Capital.
In My Capital you can see the next eight upcoming songs, and if there's one you're not feeling right now, simply swipe left on the track to replace it with another track from the Capital playlist.

You can also like or dislike a track to personalise your My Capital experience. The more you like a track, the more you’ll hear it!

We always listen to your feedback, so please get in touch and let us know what you think about our latest update at app-feedback@thisisglobal.com.

With the new Capital FM App powered by Global Player we've made it easier than ever to listen to The UK's No.1 Hit Music Station.
 
New features include:
 
- Listen to Capital FM in HD quality, live and on the move.
- Download and listen to shows offline, perfect for listening while you're travelling.
- Subscribe to your favourite shows to automatically download them each day.
- Switch and listen to all of Global's stations in HD audio.
- The 'Music For…' feature will serve you the best music for your mood.
We have fixed an issue reported by users who were unable to play catch up shows.
The latest version incorporates minor bug fixes and usability improvements.
The latest version incorporates minor bug fixes and performance improvements.
In this release we have made changes to our Privacy Statement in line with the EU General Data Protection Regulation and we have also included some performance improvements to the app.
The latest version incorporates minor bug fixes and usability improvements.
The latest version incorporates minor bug fixes and usability improvements.
Listen to your favourite Global radio stations using CarPlay – the smarter, safer way to use your iPhone in the car.

- You can now easily reset your password from within the app.
- Fixed: the app now uses significantly less storage space on your device.

Listen to hundreds of award winning audio shows with our new Podcasts feature
- Stream and download podcasts
- Subscribe to your favourite shows

- You can now access all your app settings in one location
- Bug fixes and performance enhancements

- Continue listening to your podcasts more easily from My Library
- Discover more Podcasts with our improved search
- Bug fixes and performance improvements

- Get all your favourite content in our NEW station pages
- View the last 2 songs played and the next 2 songs coming up
- Easier access to catch up shows, articles, videos and galleries
Manage your Global Account details in the app

- Listen to Live Radio through Chromecast
- Bug fixes and performance improvements
We’ve fixed an issue that caused some podcast subscriptions to disappear.
Synchronise your favourite catch up shows across your devices and control the downloads in "Settings"

- Fixed a bug with Bluetooth headphones so you can play and pause direct from the headphones
- Resolved an app crash and memory usage issue in offline mode

- New improved playlists feature with even more great music
- Bug fixes and performance improvements
More options on how to manage your data
* You can now pull to refresh to stay up to date with the latest content from your favourite Global station
Watch live video from your favourite radio shows in Global Player
In this release we’ve made some small tweaks under the hood to make the app more stable, and we’ve also improved the experience when a video ends on our brand new live video feature!

With the latest update you can now cast radio you’ve missed to any of your Chromecast enabled devices.  To access this feature, just tap on the playbar to expand it, and press the Chromecast icon whilst listening to any catch up episode.
We’ve also fixed an issue where the audio might stop after a short amount of time, after skipping a song from live radio.
You can now log in to the Capital FM app using Apple Sign In
We've improved the way you read the news

- iOS 14 Picture in Picture now supported
- Bug fixes and performance improvements
- Easily opt in to receive push notifications from Capital and your favourite Global stations

Bug fixes; performance enhancements; improved sign in and create account screens.
 
Create an account to receive great in app benefits, including:
 
• Free unlimited access to radio, playlists and podcasts
• Subscribe to your favourite shows and podcasts
• Content recommendations, personalised just for you
• Download shows to your device and listen on the go
• Access High Definition audio on your mobile
This update includes improvements to the sign in journey and more information on why you need to create an account. Push notification preferences are now synced across devices when you are signed in.

In this release you can opt into marketing emails when creating an account and select your Apple Tracking Transparency preferences. We’ve also fixed an intermittent bug with some Playlists not working.
